languages.text: "Говоришь, война с друкари не была притворством? Правда? Тогда как же ты и твои глупые подданные каждый раз узнавали координаты вражеских кораблей? Откуда знали все цели? Думаешь, твой придворный мастер по ксеносам достаточно умен для того, чтобы лично разгадать хитросплетенный план кабалитской элиты? Нет. Лишь другие друкари могли догадаться... и то немногие. Значит — {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}вы были в сговоре{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Говоришь, война с друкари не была притворством? Правда? Тогда как же ты и твои глупые подданные каждый раз узнавали координаты вражеских кораблей? Откуда знали все цели? Думаешь, твой придворный мастер по ксеносам достаточно умен для того, чтобы лично разгадать хитросплетенный план кабалитского принца? Нет. Лишь другие друкари могли догадаться... И то немногие. Значит — вы были в сговоре".

languages.text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Говоришь, война с друкари не была притворством? Правда? Тогда как же ты и твои глупые подданные каждый раз узнавали координаты вражеских кораблей? Откуда знали все цели? Думаешь, твой придворный мастер по ксеносам достаточно умен для того, чтобы лично разгадать хитросплетенный план кабалитской элиты? Нет. Лишь другие друкари могли догадаться... и то немногие. Значит — {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}вы были в сговоре{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully prepared plan of the Kabalite's finest? No, only the other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means there was a collusion between you."

"Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully prepared plan of the Kabalite's finest? No, only the other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means there was a collusion between you."

Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully hatched plan of the Kabalite's finest? No, only the other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means there was a collusion between you."

Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully hatched plan of the Kabalite's finest? No, only the other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means there was a collusion between you."

Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means you were in collusion with them."

"Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

"Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

languages.text: « Seriez-vous en train de prétendre que votre guerre avec les Drukharis était légitime ? Alors, comment vos ineptes sujets et vous avez-vous pu vous procurer systématiquement les coordonnées des vaisseaux ennemis ? Comment connaissiez-vous leurs cibles ? Votre expert en matière de xénos était-il suffisamment perspicace pour mettre au jour un plan soigneusement ourdi par la fine fleur de la Kabale ? Non, seuls d'autres Drukharis étaient capables d'une telle chose... et encore, juste une poignée. Cela signifie {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}qu'il y a eu collusion entre vous{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Seriez-vous en train de prétendre que votre guerre avec les Drukharis était légitime ? Alors, comment vous et vos ineptes sujets avez-vous pu vous procurer systématiquement les coordonnées des vaisseaux ennemis ? Comment connaissiez-vous leurs cibles ? Votre expert en matière de xénos était-il suffisamment perspicace pour mettre au jour un plan soigneusement élaboré par la fine fleur des Kabalites ? Non, seuls d'autres Drukharis étaient capables d'une telle chose... et encore, juste une poignée. Cela signifie qu'il y a eu collusion entre vous. »

languages.text: “你真的打算坚称，说你和黑暗灵族之间的战争并不是骗局吗？如果真的是这样，你和你那些愚蠢的臣民怎么每次都能准确得知敌人出现的地点？怎么能这么清楚每次袭击的目标？你真的以为，你对异形的理解足以挫败阴谋团的精英精心策划的计划吗？不，能做到这一点的，只有黑暗灵族……而且只有极少数人。这意味着{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}你们之间确实存在着勾结{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算坚称，说你和黑暗灵族之间的战争并不是骗局吗？如果真的是这样，你和你那些愚蠢的臣民怎么每次都能准确得知敌人出现的地点？怎么能这么清楚每次袭击的目标？你真的以为，你对异形的理解足以挫败阴谋团的精英精心策划的计划吗？不，能做到这一点的，只有黑暗灵族……而且只有极少数人。这意味着你们之间确实存在着勾结。”

languages.text: 「あなたとデュカーリの戦争がでっち上げではなかったと本気で言うつもりなのか？では、あなたと愚かな臣下たちは、どうやって敵艦の座標を毎度知ることができたのだ？どうして彼らの標的がわかった？異種族に精通するあなたの味方が、陰謀団の精鋭たちによって周到に練られた計画を予知できるほど利口だったとでも？そうではない。そんなことができるのはデュカーリだけだ…それもわずかの。つまり、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}あなた方は彼らと共謀していたこということだ{/d}」
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたとデュカーリの戦争がでっち上げではなかったと本気で言うつもりなのか？では、あなたと愚かな臣下たちは、どうやって敵艦の座標を毎度知ることができたのだ？どうして彼らの標的がわかった？異種族に精通するあなたの味方が、陰謀団の精鋭たちによって周到に練られた計画を予知できるほど利口だったとでも？そうではない。そんなことができるのはデュカーリだけだ…それもわずかの。つまり、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}あなた方は彼らと共謀していたこということだ{/d}」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr also wirklich behaupten, dass Euer Krieg gegen die Drukhari kein Schwindel war? Woher kanntet Ihr und Eure törichten Untertanen dann ständig die Koordinaten der feindlichen Schiffe? Woher kanntet Ihr deren Ziele? Glaubt Ihr, dass Euer Xenos-Experte gewieft genug war, um die akribisch ausgeheckten Pläne der listigsten Kabale-Mitglieder zu durchschauen? Nein, das hätten nur andere Drukhari bewerkstelligen können ... und davon auch nur die wenigsten. Das bedeutet, dass {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}Ihr mit ihnen gemeinsame Sache gemacht habt{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr also wirklich behaupten, dass Euer Krieg gegen die Drukhari kein Schwindel war? Woher kanntet Ihr und Eure törichten Untertanen dann ständig die Koordinaten der feindlichen Schiffe? Woher kanntet Ihr deren Ziele? Glaubt Ihr, dass Euer Xenos-Experte so gewieft war, um die akribisch ausgeheckten Pläne der listigsten Kabale-Mitglieder zu durchschauen? Nein, das hätten nur andere Drukhari bewerkstelligen können ... und davon auch nur die wenigsten. Es muss ganz klar eine geheime Absprache zwischen Euch gegeben haben."

"Wollt Ihr also wirklich behaupten, dass Euer Krieg gegen die Drukhari kein Schwindel war? Woher kanntet Ihr und Eure törichten Untertanen dann ständig die Koordinaten der feindlichen Schiffe? Woher kanntet Ihr deren Ziele? Glaubt Ihr, dass Euer Xenos-Experte gewieft genug war, um die akribisch ausgeheckten Pläne der listigsten Kabale-Mitglieder zu durchschauen? Nein, das hätten nur andere Drukhari bewerkstelligen können ... und davon auch nur die wenigsten. Das bedeutet, dass Ihr mit ihnen gemeinsame Sache gemacht habt."

languages.text: «¿De verdad pretende hacernos creer que su guerra contra los Drukhari no fue una farsa? ¿Entonces cómo conocían siempre usted y los inútiles de sus súbditos las coordenadas de las naves enemigas? ¿Cómo sabía cuáles serían sus blancos? ¿De verdad cree que su experto en xenos era lo bastante astuto como para anticiparse a los planes cuidadosamente elaborados de las mentes más preclaras de la Kábala? No, solo otros Drukhari serían capaces de hacer eso... y, aun así, contados con los dedos de una mano. Lo que significa que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}estaban conchabados{/d}».
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad pretende hacernos creer que su guerra contra los Drukhari no fue una farsa? ¿Entonces cómo conocían siempre usted y los inútiles de sus súbditos las coordenadas de las naves enemigas? ¿Cómo sabía cuáles serían sus blancos? ¿De verdad cree que su experto en xenos era lo bastante astuto como para anticiparse a los planes cuidadosamente elaborados de las mentes más preclaras de la kábala? No, solo otros Drukhari serían capaces de hacer eso... y aun así, contados con los dedos de una mano. Lo que significa que estaban conchabados».

languages.text: "Gerçekten de Drukhariler ile olan savaşının bir aldatmaca olmadığını mı söylüyorsun? O hâlde sen ve sersem tebaan, düşman gemilerinin saldıracağı koordinatları her seferinde nasıl bilebildiniz? Elinin altındaki zeno uzmanın, Kabal'ın en iyi savaşçılarının planını tahmin edebilecek kadar kurnaz mıydı? Hayır, bunu o Drukhari yapmış olamaz. Yapabileceklerin sayısı da çok azdır. Bu da {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}onlarla bir dolaplar çevirdiğin{/d} anlamına gelir."
languages.original_text: "Are you really saying your war with the Drukhari was not a hoax? Then how did you and your foolish subjects know the coordinates of the enemy ships every time? How did you know their targets? Do you think your expert on all things xenos was shrewd enough to divine the carefully devised plan of the Kabal's finest? No, only other Drukhari could do that... and even then, only a few. This means {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}you were in collusion with them{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten de Drukhari ile olan savaşının bir aldatmaca olmadığını mı söylüyorsun? O hâlde sen ve senin sersem tebaaların, düşman gemilerinin saldıracağı koordinatları her seferinde nasıl bilebildiniz? Elinin altındaki zeno uzmanın, Kabal'ın en iyi savaşçılarının planını tahmin edebilecek kadar kurnaz mıydı? Hayır, bunu yalnızca başka bir Drukhari yapabilir. Onların içinde bile bunu yapabileceklerin sayısı sınırlıdır. Bu da onlarla gizli anlaşmalar içinde olduğun anlamına geliyor."
